## pretty_namespace{#prettyns}

Autoappend namespace to functions in script by searchpath order. This function will search functions in the following order

  1. global environment
  1. [loadedNamespaces](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/base/versions/3.4.1/topics/ns-load) (loaded packages)
  1. [help.search](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/Rdocumentation/versions/0.5/topics/help.search) (installed.packages)
  1. online via the [sos](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sos/index.html) package (CRAN packages)
  
The `sos` search is optional and is turned off by default.

```{r,include=FALSE}
library(utils)
library(stats)
```

```{r}
txt <- '#some comment
yy <- function(a=4){
  head(runif(10),a)
  # a comment
}

zz <- function(v=10,a=8){
  head(runif(v),a)
}'

x <- sinew::pretty_namespace(text=txt)
```

```{r}
x
```
